comment: One side of ~ dfsalgen2 . If a sigma-algebra on ` U. X ` includes ` X ` and it is included in all the sigma-algebras with such two properties, then it is the sigma-algebra generated by ` X ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
